title: Hanging, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk on linen
Technique: embroidered
description: Square hanging embroidered with multicolored silk in a scroll pattern with flower and grapes. Central motif is formed by four bunches of grapes; each bunch has an identical scroll and flower motif that extends to each corner. Scrolling vine has shades of pink, purple, green and brown. Flowers are multicolored with shades of brown and purple. Background has varying shades that range from light pink to light gray. Embroidery covers the entire surface.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hanging, 19th century. Medium: silk on linen
Technique: embroidered. 1962-92-1.
